content: Logs me in without my consent. I make sure I sign out when I finish using the app. Then when I open the app again, I'm already signed in. How and why??? What is the point of signing out if you sign me in automatically?
I love the app !
last 2 weeks the app is freezing and then closes out, or as I am scrolling looking at items it just shuts down.
Disappointment across the board. They have been unable to fix the Barclays payments issue for over a month.

0 STARS, 15+ CALLS FOR REFUND! ALSO WON'T LET ME SIGN IN WHEN I KNOW MY PASSWORD ESPECIALLY AFTER I LITERALLY JUST CHANGED IT BECAUSE THE APP WOULDN'T LET ME SIGN IN TO BEGIN WITH!! All support does is tell you to reset your password like braindead clowns & I see I'm not the only one with this problem. support didn't even help me, you can't change anything, your old info will still show even if you do "change" it. The app needs to be fixed & the website, Amazon is garbage üóëÔ∏è

the unprofessional behavior. be careful about your money as I had lost a lot of time and money chasing Amazon on fraud.

I think it's time for a class action lawsuit. Talk about degradation of service! same day shipping is a joke 90% of the time it will be delayed for several days yet if you reorder you will get it immediately and have to return the delayed one. Prime video is also getting worse everyday you have to rent or buy anything worth watching. When the cost of expedited shipping is rolled into the base price that non-prime members pay anyway what is my annual subscription actually getting me?

Amazon does not care about anything only their bottom line. pathetic. Texas Flood - it's difficult to purchase things from AACOG for the flood. Unable to locate their list. I found on a volunteer website, saved it to my list, can't search for it. it needs to be easily accessible. I also called yesterday about it.
nice
Always on time and always correct

I've stopped using amazon at this point. im very let down about most its aspects at this point. temu literally has better customer service with the same items for better prices on top of allowing price adjustments. I use to love Amazon but after they screwed me over one too many times. customer support told me to purchase an item and they would give it to my for the original price I payed yet when it came time to pay they tried backing out. im out almost $400. time to talk to my attorney.

I have been using Amazon India for a long time now. Unfortunately, in the last two weeks, I have had really bad experiences.I am tired of contacting customer care(which is impossible to reach).My items were misplaced, and I received broken items. overall, it was emotional torture. I felt Amazon India is not giving any value to the customers. They dont even know how to pack glass items. Unbelievable. Heart broken experience.

Worst people ever. They will rip your bank account off almost a year after you closed your account and you will have to file fraud charges against them with your bank leaving you with out your money for two weeks until your bank investigates the charge. So in long run the bank is paying you back and they get away with your money
horrible experience with ai total lack of transparency, they are double billing for membership and there is absolutely no way to contact them. and the app is a designed by 3rd graders!!

The Amazon app is good overall. I sometimes wish I could filter other specific things, like to exclude or exclusively search for items made in certain countries. The search feature is somewhat helpful with it but going into the product specifics it is sometimes different from what was in the search. The ability to filter results has overall improved over the past few years. The ability to search for an item of a brand and select "brand only" for the Amazon stores results would be nice too.

Hard to describe without swearing. So I installed this app, entered the correct login and password. And then "for my security" I have to approve notification which is supposed to come to my other device which never comes. So this app is trash.
can't even create an account due to "suspicious activity". Total bull.
shopping is easy, but had to refresh alot of times.

Sent wrong items, won't refund said items. Tells me "the first customer service gave me a false promise" not my problem that they use AI that doesn't work properly. They also wouldn't let me review said items. I reported to the FTC and I plan to dispute with my bank. Never use Amazon. Pretty sure Jeff bezos doesn't need my money that badly.

mi vengono scalati i soldi dal conto per ordini effettuati che non vengono mai spediti e tutt'ora sono in sospeso. se cerco aiuto dall'app mi riporta alle domande frequenti e non mi d√† un assistenza clienti adeguata. pessimo servizio

Amazon have no accountability. they will make you think that they will deliver to your address as your inputted address is included in delivery method. But then when it's time for delivery the courier they chose is incompetent and will refuse to deliver the items to you, instead, will tell you that you pickup your order from their branch and you won't be allowed by Amazon to cancel your order and any complaint you give them, they dodge it and tell you to contact the BS courier they chose.
love being able to look at order history and re order items, the filter setting are relevant & awesome. Ability ro compare other vendor prices and then there is Prime. Love it!

I was on the phone for HOURS! was hung up on, transferred many times, with no results. I called and spoke to real people yesterday, and again for almost 4:20 this afternoon. l got sip, nada, from everyone. Thanks, but no thanks. ps, I was switching from shopping to prime!

update: video issue was fixed a long time ago... but now there's an issue with my cart ALWAYS having 1 item in it. I check to see what it is and nothing is there. so... I have a phantom item in my cart, I guess.... old: This app has been great for years, but now, every time I watch a video for a product, it's skips at the beginning of the video. It's weird and annoying. I think it needs an update.

it takes Amazon over a week to do a return and they still want to take forever to give you your money back they become a scam and a rip-off I would recommend going to a store spending a little extra money and get rid of Amazon
You guys have got to stop shipping with USPS. They are the absolute worst. I didn't even get my package because of them, and I paid over $100 for what I ordered. The app also crashes frequently.
horrible company. they have stolen money from me and sent used products as new. don't use this company there are better ones out there.

You can not get help with anything. I've been trying to cancel my subscription but it hasn't let me and thus charged me for a subscription it says I don't have when I try to cancel it. It just led me to nothing and there's no way to get help bc the app just takes you in circles but will never let you talk to anyone. No email or phone number to contact.

I use amazon prime almost everyday and buy everything I need, it's always delivered the next day by a great driver who is brilliant. I would be lost without Amazon Prime.
